title: Nanonets
description: Nanonets is an AI-driven solution that automates document processing and data extraction workflows. Leveraging advanced Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and deep learning models, Nanonets helps companies automate document-heavy business processes like accounts payable, order processing and insurance underwriting. Nanonets processes unstructured documents such as invoices, receipts, purchase orders, contracts, claims, and forms and converts them into structured output.
